channel.title: Robots on FTC 14607 - Robot Uprising
channel.description: Recent content in Robots on FTC 14607 - Robot Uprising

item.title: Our 2019-20 Robot: Firefly
item.description: 2020 Technical Binder Robot Overview After a rolling development period of 6 months, mk. VII of Firefly was finalized. Utilizing the NASA BEST continuous design process, the team created a final robot that consists of a mecanum drivebase, double ball-bearing slide vertical extension, linkage-based horizontal extension, passthrough intake-outtake system, and a quick intake. Drivebase Firefly’s drivebase consists of a four wheel mecanum drivetrain in a full body acetal enclosure.

item.title: Our 2020-21 Robot: Axel the Donut Delivery Titan
item.description: 2020 Technical Binder Robot Overview After a rolling development period of 6 months, Axel the Donut Delivery Titan was finalized. Utilizing the NASA BEST continuous design process, the team created an efficient final robot that consists of a mecanum drivebase, a drop down front roller intake, an gecko wheel intake transfer, a cage-like ring indexer, a two-side flywheel launcher, and a harness-like wobble goal grabber. Drivebase Axel’s drivebase consists of a four wheel mecanum drivetrain in a full body aluminum enclosure.
